data.persona: I may be poor but I make it a point to strive harder. I may be poor financially but not in wisdom. I dream of being rich one day.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church Back Row.
Inside the Church is the Back Row seat.  It is reserved for all who wish to mingle and have the status of the rest of the congregation but they do not.  They are not quite outcast, but they must wait for the proper respect of the rest.  In front of the painted black row seats are the rich mahogany sets.
There's a Back Row seat, a seat, a set, and a hymnbook here.
The leper is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to go with the leper so that I can help him.
data.mid_motivation: I want to do something kind for someone else and I think I can help ease the leper's discomfort by making an herbal ointment.
data.long_motivation: I want to become rich someday and I think that if I keep doing good deeds, good things will eventually happen to me and I will become rich and content.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get herbs from grassy area beside leper's home
